title: The young mans conflict with, and victory over the Devil by faith, or, A true and perfect relation of the experiences of T.P., begun in the 15th and continued till the 17th year of his age ... by T.P.
author: Powell, Thomas, fl. 1674-1679.
publisher: Printed for John Hancock, Sen. & Jun. ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in British Library.
